DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine predictive factor pelvic magnetic resonance response arterial embolization uterine leiomyoma .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors Pelvic Magnetic Resonance Response Arterial Embolization Uterine Leiomyoma
DOC.detailed_description: This study follow symptomatic premenopausal woman uterine leiomyoma underwent uterine artery embolization ( UAE ) . Treatment accompany magnetic resonance imaging volume entire uterus leiomyoma one month six month UAE . This patient treat Uterine Leiomyoma Sector Department Obstetrics Gynecology , Medicine College University SÃ£o Paulo . In study , investigator examine 179 leiomyomas 50 patient .
DOC.criteria: ultrasound diagnosis uterine leiomyoma presence symptom ( menorrhalgia and/or pelvic pain ) indication UAE ( desire keep uterus and/or contraindication surgery ) . malignant genital neoplasm pelvic inflammatory disease allergy iodinate contrast coagulopathy , renal failure vasculitis pelvic irradiation pregnancy subserosal leiomyoma pedicle small 50 % diameter fibroid .
